dmca.title: copyright infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Lori Eldridge [mailto:info@loriswebs.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, January 31, 2007 8:34 PM
To: Copyright
Cc: info@loriswebs.com
Subject: copyright infringement

Dear the planet

I was looking for sites that had copied my article:
"stop 302 redirects and scrapers from hijacking web page..."
which is on this page:
www.loriswebs.com/hijacking_web_pages.html

and found my aticle copied on this site:
www.ithinkgoogle.com/hackear_google.htm
Here is the IP of ithinkgoogle.com:
67.15.141.198
the host is:
ev1s-67-15-141-198.ev1servers.net  (theplanet.com)

you can see archive org's copy of my article here:
http://web.archive.org/web/20060305002732/http://www.loriswebs.com/ 
hijacking_web_pages.html
This article has been on my site since May 07, 2005.

I hope you will look into this.

Lori Eldridge - author of the above article
owner of loriswebs.com
